body_html: I mentioned this in #206, but I wanted to remind again that mixed indexing with slices/arrays has some really strange/unpredictable behavior for the order of result axes in NumPy. So it might be better to hold off on implementing that in TensorFlow until we're sure we're doing it right.
body_text: I mentioned this in #206, but I wanted to remind again that mixed indexing with slices/arrays has some really strange/unpredictable behavior for the order of result axes in NumPy. So it might be better to hold off on implementing that in TensorFlow until we're sure we're doing it right.
body: I mentioned this in #206, but I wanted to remind again that mixed indexing with slices/arrays has some really [strange/unpredictable behavior](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/206#issuecomment-221439797) for the order of result axes in NumPy. So it might be better to hold off on implementing that in TensorFlow until we're sure we're doing it right.
